about_the_game:
Miljana is a psychological horror game where you take the perspective of a soldier in a war zone.

Miljana
In Miljana, you have been trapped in an enemy fortress for weeks when you finally establish contact with your allies. They send a rescue team, but it will be up to you to guide them to your location, utilizing the advanced information you have about the enemy. However, your task won’t be limited to giving simple instructions—the success of the mission will depend on your strategic decisions and ability to overcome the challenges ahead.

Gameplay
Miljana is a first-person photorealistic simulator with various mechanics for guiding and managing a rescue team.

Key Features

  • Atmospheric environment and photorealistic graphics

  • Coordinate-based mechanics

name: Miljama horror tale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 TI 2gb | AMD Radeon HD 7770 2gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: You cannot escape from an enemy fortress due to the adverse environmental conditions. Your mission will be to guide a rescue team to your location.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
*languages with full audio support
